text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus pacificus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 1.2 to 1.8 centimetres (0.5 to 0.7 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus pacificus grows on wood in Mississippi and Hawaii, during May to June.
